description: Try our easy to follow Baked Olive & Tomato Ricotta recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Baked Olive & Tomato Ricotta Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 200g lavosh crackers (or plain rice crackers to serve)
0.25 cup semi dried tomatoes, drained, chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Lightly grease ovenproof ramekins. Place ricotta into colander lined with a clean tea towel and press firmly to remove as much liquid as possible. Transfer to a dry bowl.
Stir in olives, tomatoes, chives, salt and pepper. Spoon into prepared dishes, pressing down firmly and smooth tops. Bake for 15 minutes or until firm to the touch and golden. Cool.
Turn out and serve with crackers.
